references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Chain-of-Thought prompting, a fundamental technique that AOT builds upon and enhances for more efficient reasoning.

references.paper_title: Extension of the law of large numbers to dependent quantities
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces Markov processes, which are central to the theoretical underpinnings of AOT's Markov-style reasoning process.

references.paper_title: Tree of Thoughts: Deliberate problem solving with large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Tree of Thoughts, a test-time scaling method that AOT integrates with and improves by addressing inefficiencies in maintaining historical information.

references.paper_title: Graph of Thoughts: Solving elaborate problems with large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph of Thoughts, another test-time scaling method that AOT uses to provide further context and comparison.

references.paper_title: Evoflow: Evolving diverse agentic workflows on the fly
references.reason: This paper introduces Evoflow, a method used for comparison against AOT in evaluating test-time scaling efficiency.
